data.name: DisplayMessageBookingCancelledBody
data.value: We did not hear from you for 20 minutes so we have cancelled your booking. Please try again.

data.name: DisplayMessageEbillSignupNote
data.value:
Please note that you will not receive an e-bill until the next one is generated.
This could be the next financial year or if you tell us about a change to your circumstances.

data.name: DisplayMessageEbillSignupThanks
data.value: Thank you for signing up for e-bills and reminders

data.name: DisplayMessageEbillUnsubscribe
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop receiving bills and notices by email? If yes, your bills and notices will be sent to you by post.

data.name: DisplayMessageFileUnsupported
data.value: Sorry, we do not support this file type.

data.value: Sorry, something went wrong. Check if your GPS is turned on.

data.name: DisplayMessageImageTooLargeBody
data.value: We have reduced the size of your image but it is still too large. Please reduce the file size or use another image.

data.name: DisplayMessageSomethingWentWrong
data.value:
Something has gone wrong with our app.
Apologies for the inconvenience.

data.name: DisplayMessageSomethingWrongDates
data.value:
Your property is not set up for bulky item collections. We will need to look into this. Please try again another time.
Please note this service is for residents only and must not be used for commercial properties.

data.name: DisplayMessageSuccessFly2
data.value:
We take this issue very seriously and aim to clear fly-tipping within {0} working days.
If the fly-tipping is on private land we will investigate and contact the landowner responsible.
data.comment: {0} Number of days

data.name: DisplayMessageSuccessflySent
data.value: Thank you {0}for reporting fly-tipping to us.
data.comment: {0} Users name

data.name: DisplayMessageUpdateRequired
data.value: Please update to get the latest services.

data.name: DisplayMessageValidationErrors
data.value: Please check for errors and save again.

data.value: There are currently no dates available at that recycling centre for that vehicle type.
data.comment: {0} location,{1} vehicle type

data.name: ErrorMessageFailedToRetrieveMapPosition

data.value: Sorry, it doesn't look like your device supports GPS.

data.name: HWRCPaymentUpdateMessage
data.value: There is a charge to bring this vehicle type to a recycling centre. To make a payment you will need to update to the latest version of the app.

data.name: IntroNotificationsAbout
data.value:
Notifications sent from this app to your device can sometimes be affected by changes to software or your use of this app.
To get the best from notifications while using this app please read our advice on using Cardiff Gov notifications.

data.name: Lbl48Hours

data.name: lbl48hrProgress

For example please mention any nearby landmark or building, house number or road marking.
If you can see a number on the post please make a note of it here.

data.name: lblAnyPaymentsDD
data.value: Any payments due in the next 48 hours may already be in progress.

data.name: LblArrearsMessage
data.value: If you would like to talk to us about any arrears that are subject to court action please contact us.

data.name: LblAssessSituation
data.value: We will need to assess the situation to ensure the least amount of disruption to traffic flow and risk to public safety.

data.name: LblBagsCaddiesHeading
data.value: You can pick up your chosen items at your local stockist.

data.name: LblBagsCaddiesHeading2
data.value: Try searching each item in turn to find stock near you.

data.name: LblBagsCaddiesLimitReached
data.value: You have reached the limit of bags or caddies you can order to this property. Please contact C2C on 02920872087

data.name: LblBagsCaddiesLiveInFlat
data.value:
There are no bags or caddies associated with this property.
Check the address and try again.​ ​ If you live in a flat please contact your landlord or housing association.​ They may be able to provide what you need.

data.name: LblBalancePopup
data.value: The total amount outstanding for the account. During March this may include the charge for the next financial year.

data.name: LblBankAccountNumber
data.value: Bank or Building Society account number:

data.name: lblBankSoicetyAccHolder
data.value: I am the bank or building society account holder

data.name: LblBasketItems1
data.value: You can add up to 6 items to your order.

data.name: LblBinLookup
data.value: Enter a house number and postcode to see your next recycling and waste collection dates.

data.name: LblBulkiesNoOfItems
data.value: You can book a collection for up to 6 bulky items from a residential property in Cardiff.

data.name: LblBulkyBooked
data.value: Your bulky item collection is booked for:

data.name: LblBulkyBookedInfo
data.value:
You will receive a confirmation email with details of your booking and instructions on how to present your items.
Please make sure you have read our terms and conditions for bulky item collections.

data.name: LblBulkyEmail
data.value: We need your contact details to confirm your booking or to contact you about collection arrangements.

data.name: LblBulkyHeading
data.value: Arrange a bulky item collection to this address:

data.name: LblBulkyItemLocation
data.value: Please select where you will be leaving the item or items for collection.

data.name: LblBulkyItemNotOnList
data.value:
Sorry, we can't find this item on our list.
You may need to check spelling or enter a different phrase.
Try using the tags to help you find items by room or garden.
Don't forget a bulky item is classed as an item that will not fit in a car boot and cannot be carried safely by one person.
For more information about getting rid of household waste please see our Recycling A to Z.

data.name: LblBulkyItemRequestImageMessage
data.value: You can add up to 3 images to help us identify the item.

data.name: LblBulkyItemReuseInfo
data.value: If your item can be used again, we recommend donating it to a local charity. Some charities offer a collections service. You will need to check with individual charities to see what they accept.

data.name: LblBulkyKnockAssistRequested
data.value:
You have requested a knock and assist collection.
A member of our team will be in touch shortly.
You will receive a confirmation email with details of your request.
Please make sure you have read our terms and conditions for bulky item collections.

data.name: LblBulkyPay1
data.value: You will need to make a payment to secure your booking.

data.name: LblBulkyPay2
data.value: You will be redirected to our payment system to secure your booking.

data.name: LblBulkyPleaseNote1
data.value: Please note, if you choose to edit your booking, you will receive a cancellation email. This confirms the cancellation of your original booking. You will also receive an email to confirm your new booking details.

data.name: LblBulkyPropertyDays
data.value: Collections for your area are on a {0}.
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the specific property days

data.name: LblBulkyRefundMessage
data.value: Please note: If you book a collection that is less than {0} working days away, you will not be entitled to a refund.
data.comment: place {0} where you want the number of days to display

data.name: LblBulkySearch
data.value: Search or select a popular item from the list.

data.value: Please select a date for your collection:

data.name: LblCtaxAmendThankYou
data.value: Thank you for amending your Council Tax Direct Debit.

data.name: LblCtaxConfirmViaEmail
data.value: You will receive confirmation of these changes by email. We will send you a bill showing your instalments.

data.name: LblCtaxDDConfirmEmailMsg
data.value: You will receive confirmation of your Direct Debit instruction by email. We will send you a bill showing your instalments.

data.name: LblCtaxDDConfirmEmailMsg2
data.value: You will receive confirmation of these changes by email.

data.name: LblCtaxDDThankYou
data.value: Thank you for setting up a Direct Debit to pay your Council Tax.

data.name: LblCtaxDDThankYouAmending
data.value: Thank you for amending your Council Tax Direct Debit.

data.name: LblCTaxUserInfo
data.value:
You will find your 8 digit account number on your Council Tax bill.
Please make sure you enter your first name, last name and postcode exactly how they appear on your bill.

data.name: lblCTaxValidatePage
data.value: Please enter your Council Tax details to access your account information

data.name: LblCurrentAddressDeets
data.value: Please enter the postcode of your current home address.

data.name: LblDangerousParking
data.value: parking that is likely to be dangerous.

data.name: LblDateTimeSlotNotAvailable
data.value: The date and time you selected is no longer available. Please select a new date and time for your booking.

data.name: LblDDbillconfirmation
data.value: We will send you a bill showing your instalments.

data.name: LblDDCallbackCouncilTaxThankyou2
data.value: A member of the Council Tax team will contact you as soon as possible.

data.name: LblDDCallbackRecoveryThankyou2
data.value: A member of the recovery team will contact you as soon as possible.

data.name: LblDDCallbackThankyou
data.value: Thank you for requesting a call back

data.name: LblDDconfirmation
data.value: You will receive confirmation of your Direct Debit instruction by email.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP1
data.value: This Guarantee is offered by all banks and building societies that accept instructions to pay Direct Debits.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP2
data.value: If there are any changes to the amount, date or frequency of your Direct Debit, Cardiff Council will notify you 10 working days before your account is debited or as otherwise agreed.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP3
data.value: If you request Cardiff Council to collect a payment, confirmation of the amount and date will be given to you at the time of the request.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP4
data.value: If Cardiff Council or your bank or building society make an error in the payment of your Direct Debit, you are entitled to a full and immediate refund of the amount paid from your bank or building society.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP5
data.value: If you receive a refund you are not entitled to, you must pay it back when Cardiff Council asks you to.

data.name: lblDDGuarnteeP6
data.value: You can cancel a Direct Debit at any time by simply contacting your bank or building society. Written confirmation may be required. Please also notify us.

data.name: LblDDRefusal
data.value:
You are unable to set up a Direct Debit for this council tax account during this financial year as you have not paid all your previous Direct Debit instalments.
Find out about other ways to pay your council tax.

data.name: LblDDSummonsedDebt
data.value: You have summonsed debt on this account.

data.name: LblDDSummonsedDebtCannotPay
data.value: Please be aware that you cannot set up a Direct Debit online to pay summonsed debt.

data.name: LblDDSummonsedDebtContact
data.value: Please provide your phone number if you would like to discuss this issue.

data.name: LblDDSummonsedDebtSetUp
data.value: You can still set up a Direct Debit to manage future Council Tax payments.

data.name: LblDescribeFlyTipLocation
data.value: Please tell us anything that could help us locate the fly-tipping.

data.name: LblDescribeItem
data.value: Please give as much detail as possible, for example approximate measurements and material of item.

data.name: LblDirectDebitAddress1
data.value: We need your home address to set up or amend a Direct Debit.

data.name: LblDirectDebitAddress2
data.value: Please confirm that you live at this property

data.name: LblDirectDebitAuth
data.value: Please confirm you are authorised to set up or amend a Direct Debit.

data.name: lblDownloadDD
data.value: Please download our Direct Debit form to make an amendment and send by post.

data.name: LblDwnldDD
data.value: Unfortunately we are unable to proceed with your request online. Please download our Direct Debit form and apply by post.

data.name: LblEbillNotifications
data.value:
We will send a notification to your phone or device when your bill or reminder is sent out.
You can switch off notifications at any time. We will still send your bills and reminders by email unless you unsubscribe from the e-bills service.

data.name: LblEbillPushNotifications
data.value: Would you like to receive a notification to your phone or device when your bill or reminder email is sent out?

data.name: LblEbillSignUpMessage
data.value: Opt out of paper bills and start receiving your Council Tax bills by email.

data.name: LblEbillStatusMessage

data.name: LblEbillTitle
data.value: Please enter an email address for your e-bills and notices.

data.name: LblEmailReciept
data.value: Would you like an email receipt for this report?

data.name: LblEmailRecieptOrder
data.value: Would you like an email receipt for this order?

data.name: LblErrVehicleDetails
data.value: Registration or make and colour are required

data.name: LblFaultsToHelpUs
data.value: Please select one or more options to help us identify the problem:

data.name: LblFeatureRescheduled
data.value:
Your {0} collection has been rescheduled for {1}.
We will update your collection calendar.
data.comment: { 0 } is type of missed collection (Garden waste, General waste, Recycling, Recycling bags, Hygiene bag, Kerbside food caddy, Glass caddy). { 1 } is the date.

data.name: LblFeedbackdeviceinfo
data.value: To help us look at your feedback we have captured some information about your device and system.

data.name: LblFeedbackScreenshot
data.value: You can add up to 3 screenshots to help us assess the problem.

data.name: LblFlatWarning
data.value:
Contact your landlord or housing association before placing an order.
They may be able to provide what you need.

data.name: LblGraffitiApproximateSize
data.value: What is the approximate size of the graffiti?

data.name: LblGraffitiHigher
data.value: Graffiti is more than 1.5 metres off the ground

data.name: LblGraffitiHigher2
data.value: More than 1.5 metres off the ground:

data.name: LblGraffitiMillennumWalkWay
data.value: Millennium Walkway is a designated area for street art in the city.

data.name: LblGraffitiNotResponsible
data.value: Some surfaces in the city are not our responsibility. If you find graffiti on one of the following for example, you will need to contact the company responsible.

data.name: LblGraffitiRacistAbusiveQuestion
data.value: Do you think the graffiti is racist or abusive?

data.name: LblGraffitiSerious
data.value: We take racist or abusive graffiti very seriously and will make it our priority to remove it.

data.name: LblGraffitiSurface
data.value: Please select one or more of the following to help us identify the surface:

data.name: LblGraffitiToHelpUs
data.value: To help us assess the problem we need to know about the affected surface.

data.name: LblGraffitiWebsite
data.value: Find out more about how we deal with graffiti on our website www.cardiff.gov.uk/graffiti

data.name: LblHappy2B
data.value: Are you happy for us to contact you?

data.name: Lblhelpuswithissue
data.value: To help us with the issue you are reporting we have captured some information about your device and system.

data.name: LblHighwaysEmergencyContinue
data.value: If the issue is not an emergency please click next to continue.

data.name: LblHighwaysEmergencyNew
data.value: If you see a problem on the road or pavement that is likely to cause a serious accident or injury please call to speak to our emergency team 02920872087

data.name: LblHowManyTimes
data.value: For example how many times has this happened

data.name: LblHWRCAddress
data.value: Please provide the address where your items will be coming from:

data.name: LblHWRCBooking2
data.value: Find information about items you can bring and vehicle access at www.cardiff.gov.uk/recyclingcentres

data.name: LblHWRCBookingInfo
data.value:
You will receive a confirmation email with details of your booking.
Please bring proof of booking and proof of address when you visit

data.name: LblHWRCBookingRemainingInfo
data.value: Recycling centre bookings can be made by more than one resident at the property.

data.name: LblHWRCCannotEditTimeSlot
data.value: You cannot edit this booking as the time slot has passed. Please make another booking.

data.name: LblIamgeMax
data.value: You can add up to 3 images to help us identify the location and type of waste that has been dumped.

data.name: LblInstalments
data.value: Do you want your instalments extended to March?

data.name: LblInstalmentsMarch
data.value: Do you want your instalments extended to March?

data.name: LblIsOngoingProblem
data.value: Has this happened before or is it an ongoing problem?

data.name: LblIsOngoingProblem2
data.value: Has this happened before or is it an ongoing problem?:

data.name: LblLastPaymentMade
data.comment: {0:dd/MM/yyyy} - Date of payment, {1:C} - Amount paid

data.name: LblLikedToBeContacted
data.value: If you saw who committed the fly-tipping, can we contact you?

data.name: LblLoadingCollections
data.value: We are getting the latest collection information for your property. This may take a little while. Please bear with us.

data.name: LblLocateProblem
data.value: Please tell us anything else you think could help us locate and deal with this problem.

data.name: LblLocatioOfPost
data.value: Location of Post Office or Paypoint

data.name: LblMaxBookingExplanation
data.value:
You have reached the maximum number of bookings for this property.
Recycling centre bookings can be made by more than one resident at the property.
If you have a query about your booking limit please contact us on 02920872087.

data.name: Lblmaxthreeimages
data.value: If you are reporting a technical issue you may want to attach screenshots. Please have the images ready before starting the form. You can add a maximum of 3 images.

data.name: LblMissCollRejected
data.value:
We have reviewed your report and we will not be returning to collect this item.
Please put it out on your next scheduled collection date.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionAddress
data.value: Please provide the address where a collection has been missed.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionAlreadyReported
data.value:
This item has already been reported as missed on {0} at {1}.
If you made this report we will contact you by email with instructions.
data.comment: {0} is the date and {1} is the time

data.name: LblMissedCollectionEmail
data.value: We will send you instructions via email so your email address is very important.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionNoPreviousCollection
data.value: We cannot find information about your last collection.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionNoPreviousCollectionLink
data.value: Please check your next collection date.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionNoPreviousCollectionTitle
data.value: You cannot report a missed collection

data.name: LblMissedCollectionReported
data.value: This item has been reported as missed

data.name: LblMissedCollectionsEscalate
data.value:
We notice that you have reported a number of missed collections from this property.
Our team will review and contact you if necessary.

data.name: LblMissedCollectionThankYou
data.value:
You have reported a missed {0} collection at {1} on {2}.
You will receive an email with instructions on what to do with your recycling or waste within {3}.
data.comment: {0} is type of missed collection (Garden waste, General waste, Recycling, Recycling bags, Hygiene bag, Kerbside food caddy, Glass caddy). {1} is the time reported. {2} is the date reported. {3} is the number of days the customer will receive an email by.

data.name: LblMissingPaymentThanks
data.value: Thank you for reporting a missing payment.

data.name: LblMissPayCTAX
data.value: We will send a confirmation email to you.

data.value: You would like to change your Direct Debit payment date to the

data.name: LblMoreInfo
data.value: We may need some more information from you in order to locate and deal with the problem you are reporting.

data.value: Move the map until pin marks correct location

data.name: LblNewBillNotReady
data.value: Your new bill is being calculated

data.value: You do not have any bookings

data.value: We are unable to return collection dates for this property. If you live at this address please contact C2C on 02920872087.

You can continue with your booking but you must update your registration number before you visit.
If you do not provide your registration number you will be refused entry to the site.

data.name: LblNoResults
data.value: Unfortunately there are no results that match your search.

data.name: LblNotCollectedMessage
data.value: We did not collect your {0} because {1} For information on what to put in your bags and bins go to www.cardiff.gov.uk/collectiontypes
data.comment: {0} is the waste type (general, garden etc) and {1} is the event/reason why it was not collected

data.name: LblNotCollectedMessagePilot
data.value: We did not collect your {0} because {1}
data.comment: {0} is the waste type (general, garden etc) and {1} is the event/reason why it was {0} is the waste type (general, garden etc) and {1} is the event/reason why it was not collected

data.name: LblNotifcationsIssueText
data.value: If you have tried to resolve a notification issue using the advice we have provided, but you are still not receiving your notifications, please report this issue to us.

data.name: LblOptionTip
data.value: If you set up a Direct Debit it will run until January. You can choose to spread the payments up until March.

data.name: LblOrderItemsForDelivery
data.value: Kerbside food caddies and glass caddies are only available for delivery.

data.name: LblPersonalDetailsMessageNew
data.value:
You can enter your personal details to be stored securely and reused across the different services within this app.
This means you won't have to re-enter your details for every service.
We will not use your details for any other purpose.

data.name: LblPickUpAtLocalStockist
data.value: You can pick up recycling and waste containers at your local stockists.

data.value: Sorry, we cannot find that address. Please provide details.

data.value: Please tell us about the vehicle

data.name: LblPreferPhone
data.value: If you would prefer to be contacted by phone please enter your number:

data.value: This is private land. The land owner is responsible for dealing with this issue.

data.name: LblProblemParking2
data.value: We deal with parking problems that are covered by parking restrictions, such as yellow lines or other markings on the road.

data.name: LblProblemParkingFindOutMore
data.value: Find out more about how we deal with problem parking on our website www.cardiff.gov.uk/problemparking

data.name: LblProblemParkingServiceInformation
data.value: Some parking problems in the city are not our responsibility. Please call 101 to report:

data.value: Your weekly payments will be taken on the 1st, 8th, 15th and 22nd of each month.

data.value: Thank you for taking the time to suggest improvements to our app. Please use the comments box:

data.value:
We are unable to return bag and bin information for this property.
If you live at this address please contact C2C on 02920872087 for further advice about collections at this property.

data.name: Lblunder16
data.value: If you are under 16 you will need your parent or guardian's permission before providing your email address.

data.name: LblUsage
data.value:
This data will show us how you use the app and on which device and operating system. It helps us make improvements to the app in future releases.
We do not store any of your personal details.

data.name: LblUsingApp
data.value: We hope that you enjoy using this app.

data.name: LblUsuallyEmail
data.value: We will usually contact you via email.

data.name: LblVanMessage
data.value: Find out about the vehicles you can bring to a recycling centre at www.cardiff.gov.uk/vehicleaccess.

data.name: LblVehicleLocation
data.value: Your {0} {1}{3}is booked in at {2} recycling centre.
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the specific vehicle type e.g. car, van etc. {1} gets replaced with trailer if appropriate. {2} gets replaced with the specific recycling centre location. {3} is a space if required

data.name: LblVehicleRegNeededInfo

data.name: MapHelpMessage
data.value:
Use the map to show us the location of the issue.
Drag the map around with your finger until the pin is pointing at the correct location. Use two fingers to pinch and zoom in or out of the map.
You can also search for an address or use the GPS button to focus on a location.

data.name: MapKeyBulky
data.value: Bulky item collection booked for this property

data.name: MapKeyFlyTip
data.value: Fly-tipping report has already been logged

data.name: MapM4Message
data.value: M4 motorway is not managed by Cardiff Council.

data.name: MissingMapsApp
data.value: To get directions you will need to enable maps on your device.

data.value: You don't seem to be connected to the internet. Please connect and try again.

data.name: PageHeadingBulkiesSummary
data.value: Please check your order before making your booking.

data.name: PageHeadingCheckYourReport
data.value: Please check your report before sending

data.name: PermissionNeededCamera
data.value: We need your permission to access your camera and photos on this device. Please update permissions for this app.

data.name: PermissionNeededGallery
data.value: We need your permission to access your photos on this device. Please update permissions for this app.

data.name: PermissionNeededLocation
data.value: We need your permission to access your location on this device. Please update permissions for this app.

data.name: PlaceholderLocationInfo
data.value: For example please mention any nearby landmark or building, house number or road marking.

data.name: PopupDoNotNeedPermitHeader
data.value: You cannot apply for a resident parking permit

data.name: PopUpHWRCCommercialMessage
data.value: This service is for getting rid of household items that cannot be disposed of through kerbside collections. Businesses need to use our commercial recycling centre www.cardiff.gov.uk/commercialrecycling

data.name: PopupNoParkingScheme
data.value: Your property is not eligible for the parking permit scheme. Please visit our website for information on eligibility and more about resident parking: www.cardiff.gov.uk/parking

data.name: PopUpThankYou
data.value: Thank you for reporting this issue. Our technical team will review your feedback and contact you for more information if necessary.

data.name: StoringYourDataText
data.value:
When you use this app you do not create a user account of any kind. Any data stored across the services in this app are stored on your device.
For the Council Tax service we ask you to provide your details to access information on our council tax system.
If you choose to delete this app your personal details will not be saved or stored by Cardiff Council.
If you decide to reinstall the app you will need to enter your personal details again (to be stored on your device).

data.name: SuccessMessageBulkyItemRequest
data.value:
Thank you for telling us about an item that is not on the list.
As we will need to review your suggestion this item will not be added to your booking.
We will be in touch to let you know how to dispose of your item.

data.name: TextNotificationIntro
data.value: You can set up notifications in this app to help keep up to date with council services.

data.name: TitleGraffitiNotResponsible
data.value: Graffiti we are not responsible for

data.name: TitleNotificationCtax
data.value: Set up notifications to let you know when you get a bill, a reminder or a notice on your account.

data.name: TitleNotificationRecycling
data.value: Set up and manage notifications to let you know when to put your bags and bins out.

data.name: TitleRecyclingCentreSelection
data.value: You are making a booking for a {0}{1}{2}. You can use our recycling centre at:
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the specific vehicle type e.g. car, van etc. {2} gets replaced with trailer if appropriate. {1} is a space if required

data.name: TitleRegOfVehicle2
data.value: Please enter the registration number of the vehicle you will be bringing:

data.name: TitleRegOfVehicleUnknown
data.value: You can make a booking even if you do not know the vehicle registration number yet.
